forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High 16C. Winds NNW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High around 60F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Thunder possible. Low 8C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.title: Friday Night

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High around 60F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.
